nodes.text: Pirate brew was a green alcoholic beverage popular with the Weequay pirates of Hondo Ohnaka's Ohnaka Gang. During a banquet at their base on the planet Florrum celebrating the capture of Count Dooku, the pirates served this brew to the human Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker in an attempt to drug them, but the Jedi used the Force to swap their drinks with those of a flanking Weequay and Kajain'sa'Nikto, who fell unconscious after imbibing.

Pirate brew first appeared, albeit unidentified, in "Dooku Captured," the eleventh episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on January 2, 2009, and was identified by name in the following episode, "The Gungan General," which aired a week later on January 9.
